verses.verse: אִמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> Say לַאֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> ye unto your brethren עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> Ammi וְלַאֲחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H269><s%> and to your sisters רֻחָֽמָה׃ <S%H7355><s%> Ruhamah

רִ֤יבוּ <S%H7378><s%> Plead בְאִמְּכֶם֙ <S%H517><s%> with your mother רִ֔יבוּ <S%H7378><s%> plead כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> is not אִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H802><s%> for she [is] not my wife וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> am not אִישָׁ֑הּ <S%H376><s%> neither [am] I her husband וְתָסֵ֤ר <S%H5493><s%> let her therefore put away זְנוּנֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H2183><s%> her whoredoms מִפָּנֶ֔יה <S%H6440><s%> out of her sight וְנַאֲפוּפֶ֖יהָ <S%H5005><s%> and her adulteries מִבֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between שָׁדֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H7699><s%> from between her breasts

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or אַפְשִׁיטֶ֣נָּה <S%H6584><s%> Lest I strip עֲרֻמָּ֔ה <S%H6174><s%> her naked וְהִ֨צַּגְתִּ֔יהָ <S%H3322><s%> and set כְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> her as in the day הִוָּֽלְדָ֑הּ <S%H3205><s%> that she was born וְשַׂמְתִּ֣יהָ <S%H7760><s%> and make כַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> her as a wilderness וְשַׁתִּ֙הָ֙ <S%H7896><s%> and set כְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land צִיָּ֔ה <S%H6723><s%> her like a dry וַהֲמִתִּ֖יהָ <S%H4191><s%> and slay בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <S%H6772><s%> her with thirst

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנֶ֖יהָ <S%H1121><s%> upon her children לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no אֲרַחֵ֑ם <S%H7355><s%> And I will not have mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because בְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for they [be] the children זְנוּנִ֖ים <S%H2183><s%> of whoredoms הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for זָֽנְתָה֙ <S%H2181><s%> hath played the harlot אִמָּ֔ם <S%H517><s%> For their mother הֹבִ֖ישָׁה <S%H3001><s%> them hath done shamefully הֽוֹרָתָ֑ם <S%H2029><s%> she that conceived כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> for she said אֵלְכָ֞ה <S%H1980><s%> will go אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> after מְאַהֲבַי֙ <S%H157><s%> my lovers נֹתְנֵ֤י <S%H5414><s%> that give לַחְמִי֙ <S%H3899><s%> [me] my bread וּמֵימַ֔י <S%H4325><s%> and my water צַמְרִ֣י <S%H6785><s%> my wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H6593><s%> and my flax שַׁמְנִ֖י <S%H8081><s%> mine oil וְשִׁקּוּיָֽי׃ <S%H8250><s%> and my drink

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנְנִי־ <S%H2005><s%> behold שָׂ֥ךְ <S%H7753><s%> Therefore behold I will hedge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכֵּ֖ךְ <S%H1870><s%> up thy way בַּסִּירִ֑ים <S%H5518><s%> with thorns וְגָֽדַרְתִּי֙ <S%H1443><s%> and make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדֵרָ֔הּ <S%H1448><s%> wall וּנְתִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H5410><s%> her paths לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot תִמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> that she shall not find

וְרִדְּפָ֤ה <S%H7291><s%> And she shall follow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְאַהֲבֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H157><s%> after her lovers וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> she will not תַשִּׂ֣יג <S%H5381><s%> but she shall not overtake אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וּבִקְשָׁ֖תַם <S%H1245><s%> them and she shall seek וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> but will not תִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> them but shall not find וְאָמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> [them] then shall she say אֵלְכָ֤ה <S%H1980><s%> will go וְאָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <S%H7725><s%> and return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אִישִׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> husband הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> to my first כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> it was ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for then [was it] better לִ֛י אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> then מֵעָֽתָּה׃ <S%H6258><s%> with me than now

וְהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָֽדְעָ֔ה <S%H3045><s%> For she did not know כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> who נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I gave לָ֔הּ הַדָּגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> her corn וְהַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֑ר <S%H3323><s%> and oil וְכֶ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> her silver הִרְבֵּ֥יתִי <S%H7235><s%> and multiplied לָ֛הּ וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> [which] they prepared לַבָּֽעַל׃ <S%H1168><s%> for Baal

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> Therefore will I return וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <S%H3947><s%> and take away דְגָנִי֙ <S%H1715><s%> my corn בְּעִתּ֔וֹ <S%H6256><s%> in the time וְתִירוֹשִׁ֖י <S%H8492><s%> thereof and my wine בְּמֽוֹעֲד֑וֹ <S%H4150><s%> in the season וְהִצַּלְתִּי֙ <S%H5337><s%> thereof and will recover צַמְרִ֣י <S%H6785><s%> my wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H6593><s%> and my flax לְכַסּ֖וֹת <S%H3680><s%> [given] to cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness

וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> and then אֲגַלֶּ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> And now will I discover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַבְלֻתָ֖הּ <S%H5040><s%> her lewdness לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight מְאַהֲבֶ֑יהָ <S%H157><s%> of her lovers וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and none לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no יַצִּילֶ֥נָּה <S%H5337><s%> shall deliver מִיָּדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> her out of mine hand

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <S%H7673><s%> to cease כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all מְשׂוֹשָׂ֔הּ <S%H4885><s%> I will also cause all her mirth חַגָּ֖הּ <S%H2282><s%> her feast days חָדְשָׁ֣הּ <S%H2320><s%> her new moons וְשַׁבַּתָּ֑הּ <S%H7676><s%> and her sabbaths וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all מוֹעֲדָֽהּ׃ <S%H4150><s%> and all her solemn feasts

וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֗י <S%H8074><s%> And I will destroy גַּפְנָהּ֙ <S%H1612><s%> her vines וּתְאֵ֣נָתָ֔הּ <S%H8384><s%> and her fig trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of which אָמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> whereof she hath said אֶתְנָ֥ה <S%H866><s%> These [are] my rewards הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> These לִ֔י אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Which נָֽתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> have given לִ֖י מְאַֽהֲבָ֑י <S%H157><s%> that my lovers וְשַׂמְתִּ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> me and I will make לְיַ֔עַר <S%H3293><s%> them a forest וַאֲכָלָ֖תַם <S%H398><s%> shall eat חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> and the beasts הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <S%H6485><s%> And I will visit עָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְמֵ֤י <S%H3117><s%> upon her the days הַבְּעָלִים֙ <S%H1168><s%> of Baalim אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> When תַּקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> wherein she burned incense לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> to them וַתַּ֤עַד <S%H5710><s%> to them and she decked נִזְמָהּ֙ <S%H5141><s%> herself with her earrings וְחֶלְיָתָ֔הּ <S%H2484><s%> and her jewels וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after מְאַהֲבֶ֑יהָ <S%H157><s%> her lovers וְאֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> שָׁכְחָ֖ה <S%H7911><s%> and forgat נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I מְפַתֶּ֔יהָ <S%H6601><s%> Therefore behold I will allure וְהֹֽלַכְתִּ֖יהָ <S%H1980><s%> her Bring הַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> her into the wilderness וְדִבַּרְתִּ֖י <S%H1696><s%> and speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לִבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3820><s%> comfortably

וְנָתַ֨תִּי <S%H5414><s%> And I will give לָ֤הּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּרָמֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3754><s%> her her vineyards מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> from thence and the valley עָכ֖וֹר <S%H5911><s%> of Achor לְפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> for a door תִּקְוָ֑ה <S%H8615><s%> of hope וְעָ֤נְתָה <S%H6030><s%> and she shall sing שָּׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> there כִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> there as in the days נְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5271><s%> of her youth וִּכְי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and as in the day עֲלֹתָ֥הּ <S%H5927><s%> when she came up מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt ס

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will come בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> And it shall be at that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD תִּקְרְאִ֖י <S%H7121><s%> [that] thou shalt call אִישִׁ֑י <S%H376><s%> me Ishi וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and will no תִקְרְאִי־ <S%H7121><s%> and shalt call לִ֥י ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer בַּעְלִֽי׃ <S%H1180><s%> me no more Baali

וַהֲסִרֹתִ֛י <S%H5493><s%> For I will take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> the names הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <S%H1168><s%> of Baalim מִפִּ֑יהָ <S%H6310><s%> out of her mouth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִזָּכְר֥וּ <S%H2142><s%> and they shall no more be remembered ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more בִּשְׁמָֽם׃ <S%H8034><s%> by their name

וְכָרַתִּ֨י <S%H3772><s%> will I make לָהֶ֤ם בְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> a covenant בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> for them with the beasts הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> of the field וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and with the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְרֶ֖מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> and [with] the creeping things הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of the ground וְקֶ֨שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> the bow וְחֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and the sword וּמִלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> and the battle אֶשְׁבּ֣וֹר <S%H7665><s%> and I will break מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the earth וְהִשְׁכַּבְתִּ֖ים <S%H7901><s%> and will make them to lie down לָבֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> safely

וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <S%H781><s%> And I will betroth לִ֖י לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> thee unto me for ever וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <S%H781><s%> yea I will betroth לִי֙ בְּצֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> thee unto me in righteousness וּבְמִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> and in judgment וּבְחֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and in lovingkindness וּֽבְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <S%H7356><s%> and in mercies

וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <S%H781><s%> I will even betroth לִ֖י בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <S%H530><s%> thee unto me in faithfulness וְיָדַ֖עַתְּ <S%H3045><s%> and thou shalt know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> I אֶֽעֱנֶה֙ <S%H6030><s%> I will hear נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶעֱנֶ֖ה <S%H6030><s%> I will hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> and they יַעֲנ֥וּ <S%H6030><s%> and they shall hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

וְהָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the earth תַּעֲנֶ֔ה <S%H6030><s%> shall hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> the corn וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and the wine וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיִּצְהָ֑ר <S%H3323><s%> and the oil וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> and they יַעֲנ֥וּ <S%H6030><s%> and they shall hear אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> Jezreel

וּזְרַעְתִּ֤יהָ <S%H2232><s%> And I will sow לִּי֙ בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> her unto me in the earth וְרִֽחַמְתִּ֖י <S%H7355><s%> and I will have mercy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not רֻחָ֑מָה <S%H7355><s%> compassion וְאָמַרְתִּ֤י <S%H559><s%> and I will say לְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> to [them which were] not my people עַמִּי־ <S%H5971><s%> Thou [art] my people אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and I יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> and they shall say אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> [Thou art] my God פ
